keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants to regain control of the nation's borders and limit immigration.
UKIP believes in a National Health Service free at the point of use.
UKIP wants to reform the political system to end the out of touch Westminster club.

issues.environment: KEEP OUR GREEN FIELDS - UKIP opposes the 'house building free-for-all' on green fields and would rather see brownfield sites developed first.
issues.health: Safeguard the NHS: UKIP believes in a National Health Service free at the point of use.
issues.immigration: Control our borders: UKIP wants to regain control of the nation's borders and limit immigration.

housing.content: KEEP OUR GREEN FIELDS - UKIP opposes the 'house building free-for-all' on green fields and would rather see brownfield sites developed first.

images.caption: Suzanne Evans for Shrewsbury and Atcham
